events.strapline: Join a tour of M Shed's collection stores and encounter treasures from the city''s industrial and maritime past.
events.priceDetails: Every Tue, Thu, Fri & Sat - 11.30am.Every Wed - 2.30pm.
events.name: Behind the scenes tours
events.description: Join a tour of M Shed?s collection stores and encounter treasures from the city?s industrial and maritime past. Tours take place every Tuesday-Saturday.

events.strapline: This is the third and final exhibition in our Masters of Japanese Prints series and will feature the iconic Great Wave Off Kanagawa by Hokusai.
events.name: Masters of Japanese Prints: Nature and Seasons

events.name: Meccano: An engineering hobby for everyone

events.strapline:
Due to unforeseen issues with Mayflower's major overhaul, she will not be operating this weekend. Another of our boats will deputise. 
Explore the harbour aboard the world's oldest steam tug, built in Bristol in 1861.
events.name: Mayflower trips
